entries.note: Stamford explosion. Registration Act proposed. Lines drawn.
Peter goes to Washington with Tony. The political machinery.
The team fractures over registration.
Street-level perspective. Ben Urich and Sally Floyd cover the war as journalists.
Spider-Man unmasks on live television. One of the most iconic moments in Marvel history.
Wolverine hunts Nitro. Discovers corporate conspiracy behind the explosion.
Peter realizes the cost of unmasking. His family is endangered.
Clone Thor (Ragnarok) appears. First major battle.
Clone Thor kills Goliath. The first hero casualty. Everything gets real.
The human cost of the war. Speedball becomes Penance.
Peter switches sides to Cap's resistance after seeing the Negative Zone prison.
Punisher joins Cap's side. Kills supervillains who try to join. Cap beats him for it.
Negative Zone prison revealed. Battles escalate across New York.
Final battle. Cap has Tony beaten. Civilians tackle Cap. He sees what he's become. He surrenders.
Captain America is assassinated on the courthouse steps. Crossbones and Sharon Carter (brainwashed). The shot heard round the Marvel Universe.
The truth about Stamford. Tony's guilt. The real cost.
One More Day. Peter makes a deal with Mephisto to save Aunt May — his marriage to MJ is erased from existence.
Thanos is resurrected by Mistress Death. Silver Surfer warns Earth. The stage is set.
Thanos systematically strips each Infinity Gem from its cosmic guardian. Essential reading — this IS the setup.
Thanos has the complete Gauntlet. He snaps his fingers. Half the universe dies.
Earth's heroes assess the devastation. Adam Warlock recruits the survivors for a suicide mission.
Strange gathers cosmic allies. The mystic perspective on universal collapse.
The heroes attack Thanos. He defeats them one by one with contemptuous ease. Wolverine's bones turned to rubber. Iron Man decapitated.
Captain America stands alone against Thanos. The most iconic defiance in Marvel history. Cap's shield shatters. The cosmic entities arrive — Galactus, the Celestials, Eternity.
Surfer's role in the cosmic war. His failed grab for the Gauntlet.
Even Eternity falls. Thanos becomes the living universe. But he leaves his body unguarded.

Nebula seizes the Gauntlet. Warlock enters the Soul Gem and claims the Gauntlet from within. The universe is restored. Thanos retires to a quiet farm. The most important cosmic event in Marvel history concludes.
The final incursion. Earth-616 and Earth-1610 collide. The multiverse ends. Reed's life raft launches. Miles sneaks aboard.
Battleworld revealed. Doom is God. Strange is his sheriff. Domains of dead realities stitched together.
The life raft is found. Strange hides the survivors. The laws of Battleworld.
Stories from across Battleworld's domains. Glimpses of what Doom built.
She-Hulk leads an all-female team in the Arcadia domain.
Logan discovers the walls between domains. Begins crossing Battleworld.
Strange dies defying Doom. The survivors scatter. Reed sees his family under Doom's control.
The Shield — Battleworld's wall against the zombie hordes, the Annihilation Wave, and Ultron. The final defense.
The rebels rally. Black Panther and Namor wield an Infinity Gauntlet. The assault on Castle Doom begins.
Reed confronts Doom. 'Do you think you could have done better?' Doom: 'Yes.' The Molecule Man makes his choice.
Reed inherits the power. He and Franklin rebuild the multiverse, reality by reality. Doom's face is healed. Miles is in 616. The Maker survives. Everything restarts.
Prelude. Xavier and Magneto on Genosha. Wanda's instability grows.
Avengers and X-Men debate what to do about Wanda. Quicksilver convinces her to act. Reality rewrites.
The new reality. Mutants rule. Magneto is king. Everyone has what they always wanted.
Peter Parker is a celebrity. Uncle Ben is alive. Gwen Stacy is alive. Peter has everything — and it's wrong.
Doom rules Latveria as always. Some things never change.
Tony Stark as a celebrity inventor in a mutant-ruled world.
Wolverine remembers everything. Layla Miller wakes the heroes. The resistance forms.
The heroes assault Magneto's stronghold. The truth about Quicksilver's manipulation comes out.
'No More Mutants.' Reality snaps back. The mutant population drops from millions to 198. Decimation begins. The X-Men enter survival mode for the next seven years.

entries.series_title: Decimation: House of M - The Day After
entries.note: The immediate aftermath. Who lost their powers? Who survived? The X-Men take stock of catastrophe.
The Beyonder pulls heroes and villains to Battleworld. 'Slay your enemies and all you desire shall be yours.'
First skirmishes. Magneto fights alone. The X-Men distrust the Avengers. Doom schemes.
Battles rage. Volcana and Titania are created. She-Hulk joins the fight. Doom absorbs the Beyonder's power.
Spider-Man acquires the alien symbiote costume from a mysterious machine. The black suit that will one day become Venom.
Doom wields godlike power. Galactus attacks. The heroes regroup.
Cap faces God Doom. The Beyonder reclaims his power. Heroes return home changed. The Thing stays behind.
The sun goes dark. Vampires attack worldwide. Blade is leading them.
Heroes fight on multiple fronts. The vampire army is overwhelming.
Doctor Strange's final stand. He falls in battle.
The heroes rally. Blade's corruption is addressed. The vampires are defeated — but the damage is done.
Doom claims the title of Sorcerer Supreme. Magic and technology combined. He now has everything he needs to conquer the world.
